element.name: Fire Department ID Number
element.definition: The state assigned Fire Department ID Number for EMS Agency(ies) operating within a Fire Department.
element.v3Comment: Fire Department ID was added to better integrate Fire Department EMS Agencies and linkage to other EMS related data systems such as NFIRS (National Fire Incident Reporting System) .
element.v3Changes: Added to better associate Fire and EMS licensure and operational identifiers.

asserts.assert: Fire Department ID Number should be recorded when Organizational Type is "Fire Department".
Fire Department ID Number should only be recorded when Organizational Type is "Fire Department".
When Fire Department ID Number has a Not Value (Not Applicable, Not Recorded, or Not Reporting), it should be empty.

When Fire Department ID Number is empty, it should have a Not Value (Not Applicable, Not Recorded, or Not Reporting, if allowed for the element) or a Pertinent Negative (if allowed for the element), or it should be omitted (if the element is optional).
When Fire Department ID Number has a Not Value, no other value should be recorded.
